content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TRTV
      operator: empty
    - name: --VAMTU
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000091
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --TRTV is null, --VAMTU is not null
Outcome:
  Message: Value for --VAMTU is populated, when --TRTV is NULL.
  Output Variables:
    - --TRTV
    - --VAMTU
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0108
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --VAMT.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --VAMTU
                Section: Interventions
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --TRTV is null, --VAMTU is not null

Outcome.Message: Value for --VAMTU is populated, when --TRTV is NULL.
